(It turns out it wasn't a virus. It was just a porblem with graphics. 
But somebody still hacked into my e-mail, and I feel very vialated. 
I'm pretty sure it's nobody from here; I think I know who it is. And 
for this whole no OOC messages thing, it does take up alot of space, 
but I still think that if you combine them with a post, than it would 
be alot less jumked-up space. As for the whole new RPG thing, it will 
work out great with my chars. Vulois' whole mission is to get back to 
Cybertron to save everyone from a huge nebula. In a few months Vulois 
will join this RPG, and that's when the nebula will come.)

Fliq was about to turn to the Ark, when Bronco stirred and got up. He 
lunged forward, tackling Fliq to the ground. He started beating and 
beating, losing all rational thought. Mech fluid was spilling all out 
from Fliq's body. He screamed.

"Somebody.....somebody, please get him off of me......I can hold on 
much longer....."

Fliq went into stasis lock as Bronco contiuned his relentless attack.
